paper.title: Rule extraction for securities analysis based on decision tree classification model
paper.abstract: The rules are the true spirit of the most of the securities portfolio selection systems. In this paper, a set of stock selection rules has been derived for portfolio construction using decision tree classification model based on some fundamental factors mainly from Graham's investment rules. The C4.5 algorithm is used to construct the decision tree and extract stock prediction rules. The experimental results show that the constructed portfolio based on the derived rules has very good performance in term of one year total return.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究使用决策树分类模型提取股票选择规则，用于构建投资组合，并展示了基于这些规则构建的投资组合在一年总回报方面的良好表现。这明确属于投资组合管理的范畴。
